tweetSentenceList.constTree: (ROOT (S (NP (NP (LS i) (NN love)) (VP (VBG getting) (ADJP (JJ close) (PP (TO to) (NP (NP (NN somebody)) (, ,) (NP (PRP$ my) (NN tho)) (, ,)))))) (VP (VBZ is) (S (NP (PRP them)) (VP (VBG leaving) (NP (PRP me))))) (. .)))
tweetSentenceList.depTree: [is/VBZ nsubj>[love/NN dep>i/LS acl>[getting/VBG nmod:close_to>[somebody/NN case>[close/JJ mwe>to/TO] punct>,/, appos>[tho/NN nmod:poss>my/PRP$] punct>,/,]]] dep>[leaving/VBG nsubj>them/PRP dobj>me/PRP] punct>./.]
